text: William Dufris (February 1, 1958 â€“ March 24, 2020) was an American voice actor and Audiobook narrator. He was born in Houlton, Maine. He was known for English dubbing many foreign language cartoons and animes. His best known work include dubbing Kataoka in Patlabor: The Movie (1989) and its sequel (1993), as Elvis and Dougan in Rocky and the Dodos and as Bob the Builder in the animated children's program. Dufris died on March 24, 2020 of cancer at the age of 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the United States Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Maine
title: William Dufris
